::Kaiser/The Dragoon::
       Kaiser merely shrugs.  "Don't worry I'll speak my mind when it's 
necessary.  First things first.  Let's see what you've got for a plan so far, 
before I start critiquing it." Meanwhile the Dragoon stands silently awaiting 
orders from his present commanders.

--part1_10.300e8fda.2bf1bae9_boundary
